FILE: cm230645v11.0.txt
DYAD: SPAIN - IRAQ
RIVALRY: RIV624
DISPUTE(S): MID2764 MID3957 


PSNOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20171224
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20171224


Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables


MID2764 

TERRMID: MID2764 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2764 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2764 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2764 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2764 from Gibler (2018), Iraq sunk a Spanish oil tanker that was trading with Iran. Iraq regularly attacked ships trading with Iran to damage Iran's oil revenues. Coded territorial link MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial dispute. 

MARITMID: MID2764 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2764 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2764 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2764 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2764 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2764 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2764 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2764 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2764 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2764 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2764 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2764 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 



MID3957 

TERRMID: MID3957 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID3957 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID3957 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID3957 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID3957 from Gibler (2018), this is the Iraqi invasion of Kuwait. Spain, as part of a coalition, expelled Iraq from Kuwait. Coded third party link to territorial dispute because the Gulf War was a territorial dispute between Iraq and Kuwait, and Spain became involved to expel Iraq from Kuwait. 

MARITMID: MID3957 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3957 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID3957 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3957 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3957 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3957 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID3957 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3957 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID3957 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3957 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3957 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3957 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 


RIVNOTES:
